onboardDesc1: Trakli focuses on the basics and gives just what you need to see where your money is coming from or going to.
onboardDesc2: Let us pick up transactions for you from you sms and fill the income expense report before you get there. You can also share various statements with us like from email.
onboardDesc3: It does not cost anything to use Trakli
loginDesc: Sign in with your email address
otpDesc: Enter the OTP code sent to email
otpCodeNotSent: Didn't receive a code, resend in

name: Name
aboutAppDescription: Trakli is a personal income tracking application. The application allows users to manage and categorize their income and expenses under various groups.
pickGroupDesc: Separate your income and expenses with groups for things that should really not be mixed. For example business and personal.
deleteCategoryConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
addTransactionsToSeeChart: Add transactions with parties to see the chart

selectDateOrDateRange: Pick a date or select a date range
emailPhoneValidateDesc: Either email or phone must be provided.
logoutWarningMessage: You have unsynchronized data that will be lost if you logout now. Do you want to continue?
dataDeletionDescription: To delete all data both locally and remotely, simply remove all local records if synchronization is enabled.
dataDeletionRemoteDescription: To delete only remote data, use the "Request data deletion" button below. This will open your email client with your account details pre-filled, making it easy to submit your deletion request to deletemydata@trakli.app
dataDeletionWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Note: Once your data is deleted, you will be automatically logged out and all device sync features will no longer be available. All fulfilled deletions are permanent and irreversible.
dataDeletionEmailBody:
Hello Trakli Team,

I would like to request the deletion of all my remote data associated with my Trakli account.

Account details:
- Username / Email: {username}

I understand that once my data is deleted:
- I will be automatically logged out.
- All device sync features will be lost.
- The deletion is permanent and irreversible.
emptyPartyDescription: Parties are people or businesses you exchange money with. This helps you see spending patterns with specific vendors.
emptyPartyStep3: Use them in transactions for better insights
emptyPartyTipText: üí° Start with your most frequent payees - your employer, grocery store, or landlord!
emptyCategoryDescription: Categories help you understand where your money comes from and where it goes. Let's start with some basics!
emptyCategoryTipText: üí° Don't worry about getting it perfect ‚Äî you can always add more categories later!
emptyWalletTitle: Let's set up your first wallet
emptyWalletDescription: Wallets help you organize your money across different accounts like bank accounts, cash, or digital wallets.
emptyWalletStep1: Create your first wallet (e.g., 'Main Bank Account')
emptyWalletTipText: üí° Start with your main bank account ‚Äî you can add more wallets later!
emptyTransactionTitle: Ready to track your first transaction?
emptyTransactionDescription: Transactions are the heart of expense tracking. Each transaction tells the story of your money's journey.
emptyTransactionTipText: üí° Pro tip: Start by adding your most recent transactions to get into the habit!
emptyTransactionDescriptionOne: Start your financial journey by recording a transaction. This is the heart of expense tracking!
emptyTransactionInfo1: See your balance change in real-time
emptyTransactionInfo2: Get instant insights into your spending
emptyWalletDescriptionOne: Wallets represent your money sources - bank accounts, cash, credit cards, or digital wallets.
emptyWalletInfo1: Track all your accounts in one place
emptyWalletInfo2: See which payment method you use most
emptyCategoryDescriptionOne: Categories help you understand spending patterns by grouping similar transactions together.
emptyCategoryInfo3: Find transactions quickly with organized labels
emptyPartyDescriptionOne: Parties are people or businesses you exchange money with. Track who you're dealing with!
emptyPartyInfo1: See how much you spend at each store
emptyPartyInfo2: Track money lent to friends and family
youAllSetDescriptionOne: You now understand the core concepts of Trakli. Start tracking and watch your financial awareness grow!
youAllSetInfo3: Discover new insights about your money
financeInfo: Here‚Äôs your financial overview for all time.
welcomeDesc: Let's set up your account in just a few steps
selectLangDesc: Select your preferred language for Trakli. You can change this later in settings.
setupWalletTitle: Set up your wallet and currency
setupWalletDesc: Configure your default wallet and currency. Your wallet currency and default currency should match for accurate tracking.
allSetDesc: Great job! You've successfully set up your Trakli account. You're ready to start tracking your finances.
